house_listing.house_description: Terrific unobstructed water and marsh views! Bay access walk to ocean-waterfront beach home-cedar cathedral ceilings with wood beams-hardwood floors-spacious home-lighted 2 level deck-timber bulkhead-dock-master bedroom overlooks water-fireplace in great room-2 family rooms-new roof '98-
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Boat Dock, Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Ceiling Fan(s),Contemporary Style, Recreation Room, Skylights, Utility Room, Wet Bar
